option_1.title: Primary Back Ground Color
option_1.css: .primarycolor, .layer-caption-section, .right-panel button, .object-align button, .login-button, .save-design-button, .prcadcart, .button, .plupload_total_file_size, .plupload_cell .plupload_upload_status, .plupload_total_status,.uploadHdButton,.border-align-panel #cpclose, #previousSide a, #nextSide a,#addtocart_btn, #products-settings, #white, #font-selector > li:hover, #fb_go, #picasa_go, #instagram_go, #flicker_go, #qr_cpclose, #fb_window_container input[type="text"], #picasa_window_container input[type="text"], #instagram_window_container input[type="text"], #flickr_window_container input[type="text"], #dialog_buttons input[type="button"],#name-font-selector > li:hover, #number-font-selector > li:hover{ background: --COLOR--; }

option_2.title: Primary Color
option_2.css: .primarycolor, .layer-caption-section, .right-panel button, .object-align button, .login-button, .save-design-button, .prcadcart, .button, .plupload_total_file_size, .plupload_cell .plupload_upload_status, .plupload_total_status,.uploadHdButton,.border-align-panel #cpclose, #previousSide a, #nextSide a,#addtocart_btn, #products-settings, #white, #font-selector > li:hover, #fb_go, #picasa_go, #instagram_go, #flicker_go, #qr_cpclose, #fb_window_container input[type="text"], #picasa_window_container input[type="text"], #instagram_window_container input[type="text"], #flickr_window_container input[type="text"], #dialog_buttons input[type="button"],#name-font-selector > li:hover, #number-font-selector > li:hover{ color: --COLOR--; }

option_3.title: Secodary Color
option_3.css: .secondarycolor, .right-panel button.active, .slide-share-panel #productSides button:hover, .right-panel button:hover,.next_previous_slide ul li:hover, .priceTag { color: --COLOR--; }

option_4.title: Secondary Back ground Color
option_4.css: .secondarycolor, .right-panel button.active, .slide-share-panel #productSides button:hover, .right-panel button:hover,.next_previous_slide ul li:hover, .priceTag { background: --COLOR--; }

option_5.title: Info Color
option_5.css: .edit-tool-panel button, #info, #info .crt > span, #info .crt > i svg { color: --COLOR--; fill: --COLOR--; }
